amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for EPA Science and Technology by $1,625,000 and increases funding for Environmental Programs and Management (southern New England estuaries geographic program) by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to to reduce funding for the EPA Science and Technology by $1,625,000 and increase funding for the Environmental Programs and Management by 1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Langevin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
